name: Melancholic
description:
This is a merge for so many models that I have lost count of all the things in it.

This creates beautiful semi-realistic backgrounds with ease. I highly recommend using Adetailer and Dynamic Threshold Scale plugins to get the most of this model.

I used Adetailer with default settings. Select any face model and enable (no keywords) and let it do its magic. Dynamic Threshold I mimic scale of 20.

Simple prompts work best. I used some negaative textual embeddings in some of the example images but you dont really need those to get good output.

Adding simple descriptions to background makes it detailed. Can be quite robust at generating NSFW content as well.

Drop me a note/comment here what you think of this model with images of your generations.
